page.title: 19HOBBIES-COUSLAND 10 YR. OLDS
page.content: MY HOBBY IS LEGO-BUILDING, AND I HAVE JOINED THE LEGO CLUB. EACH YEAR, THEY SEND ME THREE "BRICKS AND PIECES" MAGAZINES, A CLUB BADGE, STICKERS AND A SEW-ON BADGE. I HAVE SIX BOXES OF TECNIC LEGO AND 5 BOXES OF NORMAL LEGO. I BUILD CARS, LORRIES, FORK-LIFT TRUCKS, T.V. CAMERAS. ONCE I MADE A LEGO FACE, WITH BLUE EYES, THAT GLOWED IN THE DARK. MY HOBBY IS COMPUTERS, AS I HAVE HAD A 16K ONE FOR A YEAR. I USE IT MAINLY TO PLAY SPACE ADVENTURE GAMES OR FOR PROGRAMMING MY OWN GAMES. MY DAD USES IT FOR HIS BUSINESS. I WOULD LIKE TO BE A REPORTER - THEN I CAN USE A WORD PROCESSOR AND PRINTER. COARSE FISHING IS MY HOBBY, WHICH I OFTEN DO ON HOLIDAY IN LOCH SHIN. I USE A 9 FEET SPINNING ROD TO CATCH PIKE OR PERCH ON A 15 POUND LINE.
